group_1.textCenter: The "Let's Ruin Everything Plan"...?
Ah...yeah, that was its name.
That time...well...@That's how it turned out, right?
So this time, we'll ruin things...@in a more spectacular way.
How? ...It's simple.
By setting up bombs.

group_1.narration: Hanna said she's going to plant bombs all over town@and then detonate them all at once.
Then, all the unpleasant things would be blown away,@we could forget everything, and, above all...

group_1.textCenter: Isn't this the perfect ending to this@shitty movie called life?
An explosive ending!
But...if we do that, people will die.
...We can't do it.
I don't care about other people's lives,
I just don't want your hands to be@stained with blood.
I don't want you...
...to get dirty...
My hands were already stained the moment@my wish was granted.
When I erased those bullies, sure,@I was excited and thrilled...

group_1.narration: "But inside...I knew I did something@that couldn't be undone."

group_1.textCenter: No...it's not about how valuable their lives were@even if they were assholes...
...I really wanted to become an ally of justice@that protects the weak.
...A heroine who protects people.
But I thought I could never be that anymore...
Well, it's not just those guys, even if I don't@remember erasing them directly...
But due to my suggestion magic@and the Witches I unleashed,
there must be a lot of people who@suffered terribly...
That's why I have to at least...remain a villain.
Here's what really happened. @Then again, sob stories are...
...a disservice to those guys.
So, don't worry about me.@Don't care about anything.
Well then...

group_1.textRight: Sena, why are you so down?
Bombs! We're making bombs!@Isn't it fun?

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind!@This time, we'll ruin everything for sure!

group_1.narration: That's right, this time, we'll ruin everything@and redo those fun memories once more!@There's no way I'm not going to like it...!
If Hanna is going to carry her sins, this time@she can share them with me.@If we can share our sins and our suffering together,@there's nothing to worry about.

group_1.textLeft: So, how do you make bombs?

group_1.textRight: Cut these iron pipes lying around here@into pieces about this size.
I'll use suggestion magic to collect@the gunpowder and other things.

group_1.textLeft: Time to show the power of the Uwasa!
How much do I need to cut?

group_1.textRight: Since we're setting them up all over this town...
Well, just a lot of them.

group_1.narration: And so, we started making bombs while laughing.
It felt like we were preparing for a school festival, @it was so much fun.
